node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `room` ( `room_id` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `member_user` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `nick` char(64) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `op` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `visible` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `borgd` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `experience` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `unixcreatetime` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`room_id`,`member_user`), KEY `exp_index` (`experience`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: room
